atk-s0403a19:2_3: Neva kiṇanti na vikkiṇantīti na gaṇhantā kiṇanti,
atk-s0403a19:2_5: Sampiyeneva saṁvāsaṁ saṁbandhāya sampavattentīti piyo piyaṁ upasaṅkamitvā paveṇiyā bandhanatthaṁ saṁvāsaṁ pavattayanti.
atk-s0403a19:2_7: Avasesaṁ ādāya pakkamantīti yaṁ bhuñjituṁ na sakkonti,
atk-s0403a19:4_5: Gītanti aṭṭhakādīhi dasahi porāṇakabrāhmaṇehi sarasampattivasena sajjhāyitaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:4_10: Tadanugāyantīti etarahi brāhmaṇā taṁ tehi pubbehi gītaṁ anugāyanti anusajjhāyanti.
atk-s0403a19:4_18: Te kira dibbena cakkhunā oloketvā parūpaghātaṁ akatvā kassapasammāsambuddhassa bhagavato pāvacanena saha saṁsandetvā mante ganthesuṁ.
atk-s0403a19:4_19: Aparāpare pana brāhmaṇā pāṇātipātādīni pakkhipitvā tayo vede bhinditvā buddhavacanena saddhiṁ viruddhe akaṁsu.
atk-s0403a19:4_21: te brāhmaṇā ime pañca brāhmaṇe paññāpentīti attho.
atk-s0403a19:5_6: So hi puṇṇapattaṁ ādāya sīsaṁ nhāto kuladvāresu ṭhatvā “ahaṁ aṭṭhacattālīsa vassāni komārabrahmacariyaṁ cariṁ,
atk-s0403a19:5_10: Taṁ sutvā manussā yathāsatti yathābalaṁ aṭṭhapi soḷasapi satampi sahassampi denti.
atk-s0403a19:5_11: Evaṁ sakalagāmaṁ caritvā laddhadhanaṁ ācariyassa niyyādeti.
atk-s0403a19:5_13: Evaṁ kho doṇa brāhmaṇo brahmasamo hotīti evaṁ brahmavihārehi samannāgatattā brāhmaṇo brahmasamo nāma hoti.
atk-s0403a19:6_0: Nevakayena na vikkayenāti neva attanā kayaṁ katvā gaṇhāti,
atk-s0403a19:6_3: So hi yasmiṁ kule vayappattā dārikā atthi,
atk-s0403a19:6_5: “Kasmā ṭhitosī”ti vutte “ahaṁ aṭṭhacattālīsa vassāni komārabrahmacariyaṁ cariṁ,
atk-s0403a19:6_8: Te dārikaṁ ānetvā tassa hatthe udakaṁ pātetvā denti.
atk-s0403a19:6_9: So taṁ udakūpassaṭṭhaṁ bhariyaṁ gaṇhitvā gacchati.
atk-s0403a19:6_14: Methunaṁuppādetvāti dhītaraṁ vā puttaṁ vā uppādetvā “idāni paveṇi ghaṭīyissatī”ti nikkhamitvā pabbajati.
atk-s0403a19:6_15: Sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokanti brahmalokameva sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:6_16: Devasamo hotīti dibbavihārehi samannāgatattā devasamo nāma hoti.
atk-s0403a19:7_0: Tameva puttassādaṁ nikāmayamānoti yvāssa dhītaraṁ vā puttaṁ vā jātaṁ disvā puttapemaṁ puttassādo uppajjati,
atk-s0403a19:7_2: Kuṭumbaṁ ajjhāvasatīti kuṭumbaṁ saṇṭhapetvā kuṭumbamajjhe vasati.
atk-s0403a19:9_11: Attatthampītiādīsu arahattasaṅkhāto attano attho attattho nāma,
atk-s0403a19:10_1: byāpādassa nissaraṇantiādīsu hi dveva nissaraṇāni vikkhambhananissaraṇañca samucchedanissaraṇañca.
atk-s0403a19:10_2: Tattha byāpādassa tāva mettāya paṭhamajjhānaṁ vikkhambhananissaraṇaṁ nāma,
atk-s0403a19:11_1: udapatto saṁsaṭṭho lākhāya vātiādikā upamā vuttā,
atk-s0403a19:11_6: Sevālapaṇakapariyonaddhoti tilabījakādibhedena sevālena vā nīlamaṇḍūkapiṭṭhivaṇṇena vā udakapiṭṭhiṁ chādetvā nibbattena paṇakena pariyonaddho.
atk-s0403a19:11_12: Imasmiṁ sutte bhagavā tīhi bhavehi desanaṁ nivaṭṭetvā arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhapesi,
atk-s0403a19:13_2: rājakulānaṁ pana kammante kāretīti kāraṇapālī nāma jāto.
atk-s0403a19:13_3: Kammantaṁkāretīti pātova uṭṭhāya dvāraṭṭālakapākāre akate kāreti,
atk-s0403a19:13_5: Piṅgiyāniṁ brāhmaṇanti evaṁnāmakaṁ anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhitaṁ ariyasāvakaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:13_6: So kira pātova uṭṭhāya gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā satthu santikaṁ gantvā vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā nagaraṁ āgacchati,
atk-s0403a19:13_8: Taṁ so evaṁ vattaṁ katvā āgacchantaṁ addasa.
atk-s0403a19:13_10: kahaṁ nu kho pātova gantvā āgacchatī”ti cintetvā anukkamena santikaṁ āgataṁ sañjānitvā “handa kuto nū”tiādivacanaṁ avoca.
atk-s0403a19:14_2: Paṇḍito maññeti bhavaṁ piṅgiyānī samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ paṇḍitoti maññati,
atk-s0403a19:14_3: udāhu noti ayamettha attho. Ko cāhaṁ, bhoti, bho,
atk-s0403a19:14_4: samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyajānane ahaṁ ko nāma?
atk-s0403a19:14_5: Ko ca samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ jānissāmīti kuto cāhaṁ samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ jānissāmi,
atk-s0403a19:14_6: kena nāma kāraṇena jānissāmīti evaṁ sabbathāpi attano ajānanabhāvaṁ dīpeti.
atk-s0403a19:14_7: Sopi nūnassa tādisovāti yo samaṇassa gotamassa paññāveyyattiyaṁ jāneyya,
atk-s0403a19:14_8: sopi nūna dasa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṁ patto tādiso buddhoyeva bhaveyya.
atk-s0403a19:14_9: Sineruṁ vā hi pathaviṁ vā ākāsaṁ vā pametukāmena tappamāṇo daṇḍo vā rajju vā laddhuṁ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0403a19:14_10: samaṇassa gotamassa paññaṁ jānantenapi tassa ñāṇasadisameva sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ laddhuṁ vaṭṭatīti dīpeti.
atk-s0403a19:14_12: Uḷārāyāti uttamāya seṭṭhāya. Ko cāhaṁ, bhoti, bho,
atk-s0403a19:14_13: ahaṁ samaṇassa gotamassa pasaṁsane ko nāma.
atk-s0403a19:14_14: Ko ca samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ pasaṁsissāmīti kena kāraṇena pasaṁsissāmi.
atk-s0403a19:15_0: Pasatthappasatthoti sabbaguṇānaṁ upari carehi sabbalokapasatthehi attano guṇeheva pasattho,
atk-s0403a19:15_2: Yathā hi campakapupphaṁ vā nīluppalaṁ vā padumaṁ vā lohitacandanaṁ vā attano vaṇṇagandhasiriyāva pāsādikañceva sugandhañca,
atk-s0403a19:15_3: na tassa āgantukehi vaṇṇagandhehi thomanakiccaṁ atthi.
atk-s0403a19:15_4: Yathā ca maṇiratanaṁ vā candamaṇḍalaṁ vā attano ālokeneva obhāsati,
atk-s0403a19:15_6: evaṁ samaṇo gotamo sabbalokapasatthehi attano guṇeheva pasattho thomito,
atk-s0403a19:16_5: pāveyyakā mallā kosinārakā mallā aññepi te te khattiyā tehi tehi jānapadehi pasatthā,
atk-s0403a19:16_14: Te sabbepi dasabalaṁ thomenti vaṇṇenti pasaṁsantīti bhagavā “pasatthappasattho”ti vuccati.
atk-s0403a19:17_0: Athassa so attano pasādakāraṇaṁ ācikkhanto seyyathāpi, bho,
atk-s0403a19:17_2: Tattha aggarasaparitittoti bhojanarasesu pāyāso sneharasesu gosappi,
atk-s0403a19:17_5: Tesu yena kenaci parititto ākaṇṭhappamāṇaṁ bhuñjitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0403a19:17_11: Aññesaṁ puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇāppavādānanti ye aññesaṁ puthūnaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ laddhisaṅkhātappavādā, tesaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:17_14: Jighacchādubbalyaparetoti jighacchāya ceva dubbalabhāvena ca anugato.
atk-s0403a19:17_15: Madhupiṇḍikanti sālipiṭṭhaṁ bhajjitvā catumadhurena yojetvā kataṁ baddhasattupiṇḍikaṁ,
atk-s0403a19:17_18: Asecanakanti madhurabhāvakaraṇatthāya aññena rasena anāsittakaṁ ojavantaṁ paṇītarasaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:18_7: Yathā hi yaṁ telaṁ mānaṁ gahetuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-s0403a19:18_10: Yañca jalaṁ taḷākaṁ gahetuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-s0403a19:18_13: Evamevaṁ yaṁ pītivacanaṁ hadayaṁ gahetuṁ na sakkoti,
atk-s0403a19:18_14: adhikaṁ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati,
atk-s0403a19:21_7: Tapantamādiccamivantalikkheti dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu mahādīpesu ālokakaraṇavasena antalikkhe tapantaṁ ādiccaṁ viya virocamānaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:21_8: Aṅgīrasaṁ passāti attānameva vā mahājanaṁ vā sandhāya evaṁ vadati.
atk-s0403a19:23_1: Chaṭṭhe mahāsupināti mahantehi purisehi passitabbato mahantānañca atthānaṁ nimittabhāvato mahāsupinā.
atk-s0403a19:23_3: Tattha supinaṁ passanto catūhi kāraṇehi passati dhātukkhobhato vā anubhūtapubbato vā devatopasaṁhārato vā pubbanimittato vāti.
atk-s0403a19:24_0: Tattha pittādīnaṁ khobhakaraṇapaccayappayogena khubhitadhātuko dhātukkhobhato supinaṁ passati.
atk-s0403a19:24_1: Passanto ca nānāvidhaṁ supinaṁ passati pabbatā patanto viya,
atk-s0403a19:24_4: Anubhūtapubbato passanto pubbe anubhūtapubbaṁ ārammaṇaṁ passati.
atk-s0403a19:24_5: Devatopasaṁhārato passantassa devatā atthakāmatāya vā anatthakāmatāya vā atthāya vā anatthāya vā nānāvidhāni ārammaṇāni upasaṁharanti.
atk-s0403a19:24_6: So tāsaṁ devatānaṁ ānubhāvena tāni ārammaṇāni passati.
atk-s0403a19:24_7: Pubbanimittato passanto puññāpuññavasena uppajjitukāmassa atthassa vā anatthassa vā pubbanimittabhūtaṁ
atk-s0403a19:24_10: ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto ime pañca mahāsupine viya cāti.
atk-s0403a19:25_0: Tattha yaṁ dhātukkhobhato anubhūtapubbato ca supine passati,
atk-s0403a19:25_3: taṁ saccaṁ vā hoti alikaṁ vā.
atk-s0403a19:25_4: Kuddhā hi devatā upāyena vināsetukāmā viparītampi katvā dassenti.
atk-s0403a19:25_7: Etesaṁ catunnaṁ mūlakāraṇānaṁ saṁsaggabhedatopi supinabhedo hotiyeva.
atk-s0403a19:26_0: Taṁ panetaṁ catubbidhampi supinaṁ sekhaputhujjanāva passanti appahīnavipallāsattā,
atk-s0403a19:26_2: Kiṁ panetaṁ passanto sutto passati paṭibuddho,
atk-s0403a19:26_7: taṁ rūpanimittādiārammaṇaṁ rāgādisampayuttaṁ vā na hoti.
atk-s0403a19:26_8: Supinaṁ passantassa ca īdisāni cittāni uppajjanti.
atk-s0403a19:26_13: Sabbohārikacittena ca kate vītikkame anāpatti nāma natthi.
atk-s0403a19:26_14: Supinaṁ passantena pana katepi vītikkame ekantaṁ anāpatti eva.
atk-s0403a19:26_15: Atha neva sutto na paṭibuddho passati,
atk-s0403a19:26_17: Evañca sati supinassa abhāvo ca āpajjati?
atk-s0403a19:27_1: Yathā hi makkaṭassa niddā lahuparivattā hoti,
atk-s0403a19:27_2: evaṁ yā niddā punappunaṁ kusalādicittavokiṇṇattā lahuparivattā,
atk-s0403a19:27_3: yassā pavattiyaṁ punappunaṁ bhavaṅgato uttaraṇaṁ hoti,
atk-s0403a19:27_5: Tenāyaṁ supino kusalopi hoti akusalopi abyākatopi.
atk-s0403a19:27_8: dvīhi antehi mutto āvajjanatadārammaṇakkhaṇe abyākatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0403a19:27_9: Svāyaṁ dubbalavatthukattā cetanāya paṭisandhiṁ ākaḍḍhituṁ asamattho.
atk-s0403a19:27_10: Pavatte pana aññehi kusalākusalehi upatthambhito vipākaṁ deti.
atk-s0403a19:27_12: atha kho avisaye uppannattā abbohārikāva supinantacetanā.
atk-s0403a19:27_13: So panesa supino kālavasenapi divā tāva diṭṭho na sameti,
atk-s0403a19:27_15: Balavapaccūse pana asitapītakhāyite sammā pariṇāmaṁ gate kāyasmiṁ ojāya patiṭṭhitāya aruṇe uggacchamāneva diṭṭho supino sameti.
atk-s0403a19:28_0: Ime pana pañca mahāsupine neva lokiyamahājano passati,
atk-s0403a19:28_7: Amhākaṁ pana bodhisatto kadā ime supine passīti?
atk-s0403a19:28_8: “Sve buddho bhavissāmī”ti cātuddasiyaṁ pakkhassa rattivibhāyanakāle passi.
atk-s0403a19:28_10: So ime supine disvā uṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṁ ābhuñjitvā nisinno cintesi –
atk-s0403a19:28_11: “sace mayā kapilavatthunagare ime supinā diṭṭhā assu,
atk-s0403a19:28_15: Imasmiṁ kho pana ṭhāne imesaṁ paṭiggāhako nāma natthi,
atk-s0403a19:28_17: Tato “idaṁ imassa pubbanimittaṁ idaṁ imassā”ti sayameva supine paṭiggaṇhitvā uruvelagāme sujātāya dinnaṁ
atk-s0403a19:28_18: pāyāsaṁ paribhuñjitvā bodhimaṇḍaṁ āruyha bodhiṁ patvā anukkamena jetavane viharanto attano makulabuddhakāle
atk-s0403a19:28_19: diṭṭhe pañca mahāsupine vitthāretuṁ bhikkhū āmantetvā imaṁ desanaṁ ārabhi.
atk-s0403a19:29_0: Tattha mahāpathavīti cakkavāḷagabbhaṁ pūretvā ṭhitā mahāpathavī.
atk-s0403a19:29_3: So pana na udakasmiṁyeva ṭhapito ahosi,
atk-s0403a19:29_4: atha kho pācīnasamuddassa uparūparibhāgena gantvā pācīnacakkavāḷamatthake ṭhapito ahosīti veditabbo.
atk-s0403a19:29_5: Pacchime samudde dakkhiṇe samuddeti etesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0403a19:29_7: Nābhiyā uggantvā nabhaṁ āhacca ṭhitā ahosīti naṅgalamattena rattadaṇḍena nābhito uggantvā passantassa
atk-s0403a19:29_8: passantasseva vidatthimattaṁ ratanamattaṁ byāmamattaṁ yaṭṭhimattaṁ gāvutamattaṁ aḍḍhayojanamattaṁ yojanamattanti
atk-s0403a19:29_9: evaṁ uggantvā uggantvā anekayojanasahassaṁ nabhaṁ āhacca ṭhitā ahosi.
atk-s0403a19:29_10: Pādehi ussakkitvāti agganakhato paṭṭhāya pādehi abhiruhitvā.
atk-s0403a19:29_18: Dīghāyukabuddhā pana tiyojanike mīḷhapabbate anupavisitvā nisinnā viya honti.
atk-s0403a19:30_0: Evaṁ ettakena ṭhānena pubbanimittāni dassetvā idāni saha pubbanimittehi paṭilābhaṁ dassetuṁ yampi,
atk-s0403a19:30_2: Tattha sabbaguṇadāyakattā buddhānaṁ arahattamaggo anuttarā sammāsambodhi nāma.
atk-s0403a19:30_3: Tasmā yaṁ so cakkavāḷamahāpathaviṁ sirisayanabhūtaṁ addasa,
atk-s0403a19:30_7: Yaṁ cattāro hatthapāde cakkavāḷamatthake ṭhite addasa,
atk-s0403a19:30_10: taṁ tīsu bhavesu avakujjānaṁ sattānaṁ uttānamukhabhāvassa pubbanimittaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:30_11: Yaṁ akkhīni ummīletvā passanto viya ahosi,
atk-s0403a19:32_3: Pāṇinā udakaṁ sampaṭicchitvāti uppannaṁ utusamuṭṭhānaṁ udakaṁ tiyojanasatena hatthena paṭiggahetvā.
atk-s0403a19:32_4: Pamattā hontīti attano kīḷāya pamattā honti vippavuṭṭhasatino.
atk-s0403a19:32_5: Tesañhi sakāya ratiyā “ramāmā”ti citte uppanne akālepi devo vassati,
atk-s0403a19:34_4: asubhajjhānato vuṭṭhāya agadaṁ gahetvā visaṁ vīmaṁsanto viya vīmaṁsanatthaṁ kāmābhimukhaṁ cittaṁ pesentassāti attho.
atk-s0403a19:34_9: Yathā pana kukkuṭapattaṁ vā nhārudaddulaṁ vā aggimhi pakkhittaṁ paṭilīyati patikuṭati pativaṭṭati na saṁpasārīyati,
atk-s0403a19:34_11: Nekkhammaṁ kho panāti idha nekkhammaṁ nāma asubhesu paṭhamajjhānaṁ,
atk-s0403a19:34_13: Tassa taṁ cittanti tassa taṁ asubhajjhānacittaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:34_18: Kāmapaccayā āsavā nāma kāmahetukā cattāro āsavā.
atk-s0403a19:34_21: Na so taṁ vedanaṁ vediyatīti so taṁ kāmavedanaṁ vighātapariḷāhavedanañca na vediyati.
atk-s0403a19:34_22: Idamakkhātaṁ kāmānaṁ nissaraṇanti idaṁ asubhajjhānaṁ kāmehi nissaṭattā kāmānaṁ nissaraṇanti akkhātaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:34_23: Yo pana taṁ jhānaṁ pādakaṁ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto tatiyamaggaṁ patvā anāgāmiphalena nibbānaṁ disvā “puna kāmā nāma natthī”ti jānāti.
atk-s0403a19:35_5: Pañcamavāre sakkāyaṁ manasikarototi suddhasaṅkhāre pariggaṇhitvā arahattaṁ pattassa sukkhavipassakassa
atk-s0403a19:35_6: phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya vīmaṁsanatthaṁ pañcupādānakkhandhābhimukhaṁ cittaṁ pesentassa.
atk-s0403a19:35_7: Idamakkhātaṁ sakkāyassa nissaraṇanti idaṁ arahattamaggena ca phalena ca nibbānaṁ disvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0403a19:35_8: “puna sakkāyo natthī”ti uppannaṁ arahattaphalasamāpatticittaṁ sakkāyassa nissaraṇanti akkhātaṁ.
atk-s0403a19:35_9: Idāni evaṁ sakkāyanissaraṇaṁ nirodhaṁ patvā ṭhitassa khīṇāsavassa vaṇṇaṁ kathento tassa kāmanandīpi nānusetītiādimāha.
